name: Torchure (Zeno, Yzee, malek elsady)
description:
Controls
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • LMB - Shoot
  • RMB - Switch between holding a torch or a gun
  • Full Screen for the Best Experience
Description

You play as a person with a gun and a torch, but you cannot hold both of them at the same time. You have to switch between holding the gun and holding the torch. If you hold the gun, you can shoot enemies but you will have a small field of view. If you hold the torch, you will have a large field of view but you cannot shoot enemies. This game fits the theme because the torch joins the player with the ability to see and the gun breaks  it. Good luck, gamers!

A Word From The Author

The following game is made for the GMTK jam with the theme "joined together". This game is made in 2 days. No external assets are used in this game.

  • Game Developer: Zeno
  • Musician and SFX: Yzee
  • Artist: malek elsady
  • Game Engine: Godot
